isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE, AND FENDERS - 5000i, 9000i - REMOVE - REMOVE HOOD GRILLE SURROUND (TRIM)

svcsubproc.title: Remove Hood Grille Surround (Trim) on 9200 i (SBA) and 9400 i (SBA)

step1.para: Remove the hood grille assembly, refer to Remove Hood Grille on 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA), 9400 i (SBA) and 5500 i (SFA) and 5600 i (SBA) with Tilt Hood .

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 41 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: To remove the hood grille surround (trim) (Item 1), have the hood assembly (Item 2) closed and latched.

Use a heat gun to heat the hood grille surround (trim) (Item 1). Heat a small section of hood grille surround (trim) starting at the top right or left corner. Use a lightweight pair of gloves to protect your fingers. Use your fingers to pull the hood grille surround (trim) away from the hood assembly (Item 2).

Heat another small section of the hood grille surround (trim) (Item 1) and pull the hood grille surround (trim) away from the hood assembly (Item 2). Continue this procedure until the hood grille surround (trim) has been removed.

figure.caption: Figure 41. Remove Hood Grille Surround (Trim) on 9200 i (SBA) and 9400 i (SBA)

svcsubproc.title: Remove Hood Grille Surround (Trim) on 9900 i (SFA), 9900 ix (SFA) and 5900 i (SFA) with Tilt Hood

step1.para: Remove the hood grille assembly, refer to Remove Hood Grille on 9900 i (SFA), 9900 ix (SFA) and 5900 i (SFA) with Tilt Hood .

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 42 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: To remove the hood grille surround (trim) sections (Items 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 and 6), have the hood assembly (Item 7) closed and latched.

Remove six elastic stop lock nuts (Item 8, Section A - A) from six hood grille surround (trim) mounting studs (Item 9, Section A - A) on the top hood grille surround (trim) (Item 1) and remove top hood grille surround (trim) with six flat washers (Item 10) from the hood assembly (Item 7). Save for installation if not damaged.

Remove four elastic stop lock nuts (Item 11, Section B - B) from four hood grille surround (trim) mounting studs (Item 12, Section B - B) on the lower hood grille surround (trim) (Item 2) and remove lower hood grille surround (trim) with four flat washers (Item 13) and four hood grille surround (trim) mounting clips (Item 14) from the hood assembly (Item 7). Save for installation if not damaged.

figure.caption: Figure 42. Remove Hood Grille Surround (Trim) on 9900 i (SFA), 9900 ix (SFA) and 5900 i (SFA) with Tilt Hood

step1.para: Remove two elastic stop lock nuts (Item 15, Section C - C) from the two hood grille surround (trim) mounting studs (Item 16, Section C - C) on the passenger side hood grille surround (trim) (Item 3) and remove passenger side hood grille surround (trim) with two flat washers (Item 17) from the hood assembly (Item 7). Save for installation if not damaged.

Remove two elastic stop lock nuts (Item 18, Section D - D) from the two hood grille surround (trim) mounting studs (Item 19, Section D - D) on the driver side hood grille surround (trim) (Item 4) and remove driver side hood grille surround (trim) with two flat washers (Item 20) from the hood assembly (Item 7). Save for installation if not damaged.

Remove four sheet metal screws (Item 21) securing passenger side headlight bezel (Item 5) or driver side headlight bezel (Item 6) to the hood assembly (Item 7) and remove passenger side or driver side headlight bezel as required. Save for installation if not damaged.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Hood Grille Surround (Trim) on 5500 i (SFA) and 5600 i (SBA) with Tilt Hood

step1.para: Remove the hood grille assembly, refer to Remove Hood Grille on 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA), 9400 i (SBA) and 5500 i (SFA) and 5600 i (SBA) with Tilt Hood .

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 43 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: To remove the hood grille surround (trim) (Item 1), have the hood assembly (Item 2) closed and latched.

Remove four hex bolts (Item 3) with flat washers (Item 4) securing hood grille surround (trim) (Item 1) to the four speed nuts (Item 5) on the hood assembly (Item 2). Save for installation if not damaged.
If it is necessary to remove the four speed nuts (Item 5) from the hood assembly (Item 2), pull them off. Save for installation if not damaged.

figure.caption: Figure 43. Remove Hood Grille Surround (Trim) on 5500 i (SFA) and 5600 i (SBA) with Tilt Hood

step1.para: Use a heat gun to heat the hood grille surround (trim) (Item 1). Heat a small section of hood grille surround (trim) starting at the top right or left corner. Use a lightweight pair of gloves to protect your fingers. Use your fingers to pull the hood grille surround (trim) away from the hood assembly (Item 2).

Heat another small section of the hood grille surround (trim) (Item 1) and pull the hood grille surround (trim) away from the hood assembly (Item 2). Continue this procedure until the hood grille surround (trim) has been removed.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Grille/Radiator Trim on 5600 i (SBA) With Optional Butterfly Hood
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 44 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: To remove upper grille/radiator trim (Item 1), driver side grille/radiator trim (Item 2), driver side hood corner panel (Item 3), passenger side grille/radiator trim (Item 4) and passenger side hood corner panel (Item 5), first remove the hood assembly; refer to Remove Optional Butterfly Hood on 5600 i (SBA) .
Remove grille; refer to Remove Grille on 5600 i (SBA) with Optional Butterfly Hood .
Remove radiator shell hood seals; refer to Remove Radiator Shell Hood Seals on 5600 i (SBA) with Optional Butterfly Hood .

Remove two hex bolts (Item 6) and hex nuts with lock washers (Items 7 and 8) that secure the upper grille/radiator trim (Item 1) and driver side grille/radiator trim (Item 2) to the grille/radiator trim mounting bracket (Item 9), driver side shown. Save mounting hardware for installation.

Repeat step 4 above to remove the upper grille/radiator trim (Item 1) and passenger side grille/radiator trim (Item 4) from the grille/radiator trim mounting bracket on the passenger side. Save mounting hardware for installation.

note.para: It is not necessary to remove radiator fill cap (Item 10) to remove upper grille/radiator trim (Item 1). It will come off with the upper grille/radiator trim.

step1.para: Once the mounting hardware is removed on both driver and passenger side at the grille/radiator trim mounting brackets, remove the upper grille/radiator trim (Item 1). Save for installation if not replacing.

Once the upper grille/radiator trim (Item 1) is removed, to remove driver side grille/radiator trim and driver side hood corner panel (Items 2 and 3), remove four hex bolts with lock washers (Items 11 and 12), that secure the driver side grille/radiator trim and driver side hood corner panel to the grille/radiator trim radiator mounting bracket (Item 13), driver side shown. Save for installation if not replacing.

Remove four pan head mach. screws with lock washers and flat washers (Items 14, 15 and 16), that secure the driver side grille/radiator trim (Item 2) to both grille/radiator trim radiator mounting braces (Item 17), driver side shown. Save for installation if not replacing.

Then remove two pan head mach. screws (Item 18) and two hex nuts, lock washers and flat washers (Items 19, 20 and 21), that secure the driver side hood corner panel (Item 3) to the grille/radiator trim radiator mounting brace (Item 17), driver side shown. Remove driver side grille/radiator trim and driver side hood corner panel. Save for installation if not replacing.

figure.caption: Figure 44. Remove Grille/Radiator Trim on 5600 i (SBA) With Butterfly Hood

step1.para: To remove passenger side grille/radiator trim and passenger side hood corner panel (Items 4 and 5), repeat steps 7, 8 and 9 above.

To separate passenger side grille/radiator trim (Item 4) from passenger side hood corner panel (Item 5), remove three pan head mach. screws with lock washers (Items 22 and 23) that secure them together, passenger side shown. Save for installation if not replacing.
Repeat procedure to separate driver side grille/radiator trim (Item 2) from driver side hood corner panel (Item 3).

If it is necessary to remove radiator fill cap (Item 10) from upper grille/radiator trim (Item 1), remove two pan head mach. screws (Item 24) and remove radiator fill cap, two water outlet spacers (Item 25) and radiator fill cap mounting plate (Item 26). Save for installation if not replacing.
